data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 6,476 believers in Nyanga, Gabon a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nyanga, Gabon
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Nyanga with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Nyanga, Gabon to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Nyanga.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Arab people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Nyanga.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Nyanga, Gabon.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Nyanga, Gabon to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

location.name: Nyanga
location.people_groups_list: Eviya, Ndambomo, Wolof, Simba, Teke, Northern
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Eviya (500), Ndambomo (1,300), Wolof (13,000), Simba (200), Teke, Northern (156,000)
